#summary Board for testing BGA reflow soldering

This board is still under development.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found through [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Current_Designs/BGA_Regulator/ `directory.

PCB of this design can be purchased at cost through [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44119 BatchPCB].
